location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.1734 of 1854 from Henry Anderson, Acting Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of Kemball’s earlier letter (folio 201) relating to the imposition of an arbitrary fine by Shaikh ‘Abdullāh bin Sultan of Sharjah on one of the town’s Banyan merchants. Anderson writes that the Government approves of Kemball’s proceedings in the matter.
